verses.name: Luke 14:18
verses.text: And they all with one consent began to make excuse. The first said unto him, I have bought a piece of ground, and I must needs go and see it: I pray thee have me excused.

verses.name: Luke 14:19
verses.text: And another said, I have bought five yoke of oxen, and I go to prove them: I pray thee have me excused.

verses.name: Luke 14:20
verses.text: And another said, I have married a wife, and therefore I cannot come.
